messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Unschooling with a Distributed Learning Progr...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:26:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time, scubamama@earthlink.net writes: Unschooling limits one in relation to the history of schooling.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/2004 3:26:51 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
scubamama@... writes:

Unschooling limits one in relation to the history of schooling.
Trusting people to know what and how they want to live and learn is
more encompassing than schooling or unschooling. <<<<

Well, since my definition of unschooling is respecting the child and
trusting him to know what and how he wants to live and learn, I take exception to
this.

I don't find it limiting at all.

~Kelly




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
